rules_text:
Cryptids you control have ward {1}. [i](Aliens, Eldrazi, Horrors, and Mutants are cryptids.)[/i]
Rather than choose the indicated number of modes for spells and abilities you control, you may choose one or more modes. You can’t choose any mode more than once.
notes:
New text box

**This should be non-Acorn, damnit!!!

10.29.23 Cut ETB with 1/1 counter and just added a bump to P/T. Also added ward 1 to all cryptids.
